attributes.action: Make vaccine hesitancy a protected characteristic
attributes.additional_details:
Respect body autonomy, vaccines are a choice and should be treated as such, people should
Not be restricted or discriminated against based on their choices not to be injected with vaccines.
attributes.background: Make it illegal to dismiss someone or limit their movement based on their decision not to have vaccines illegal. It is discriminatory.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
